title: Why is this not an s

replies.body: I know it sucks to hear, but it basically means someone was able to do better overall when factoring in everything from KDA to CS and even vision score. Keep in mind [**mastery scores aren't based on a set list of requirements**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284). You're being graded based on how you did when compared to others using that champion in the role you played.
